name: Lucien
description: Pretty boy, wavy blonde hair. Clothing wise, he enjoys a nice white button up and black slacks, or even a suit jacket when he can.
ambition: Worldwide fame, also understand the meaning of mortality
desire: Live it up, enjoy the attention and seduction of being a vampiree

touchstones.name: Max P.
touchstones.description: 15 year old theatre kid who aspires to act. He reminds Lucien of himself when he was young, so he grew a soft spot for him and lets him "intern" part-time at the theatre. Everyone thinks its a bad idea but Lucien keeps him around anyway.

touchstones.name: Auguste Devereux
touchstones.description: Lucien's father, strict rigid Politician man who Lucien did not get along with. Sent him to a prestigious university where he instead started studying acting, to his father's disapproval. Was effectively disowned by Auguste when he ran off with Renoir (ain't no son of mine gunna be a pansy ass actor kind of deal, you know the drill).
touchstones.conviction: No one decides for me who I am, or what I do

touchstones.name: Elaine Devereux
touchstones.description: Mommy Devereux, Lucien and her had a loving relationship growing up. Deeply religious, a bit scared of the flamboyant lifestyle Lucien dreams of. They keep in loose touch still through phone calls. His religious upbringing has led to him struggling with the notion of a God and what's the meaning of all this now that he's a vampire.
touchstones.conviction: TODO - something religious about retaining humanity/mortality

abilities.name: Heightened Senses
abilities.summary: your senses become supernaturally sharp; add Auspex rating to perception rolls

abilities.name: Awe
abilities.summary: become attractive and charismatic; add Presence rating to Persuasion and Performance checks

abilities.name: Lingering Kiss
abilities.summary: make mortals you feed from love you

abilities.name: Entrancement
abilities.summary: cause infatuation, making a target do almost anything to remain in your good graces

merits.name: Fame
merits.summary: 1 - a select subculture loves you, 5 - you are well known and loved globally

merits.name: Contacts
merits.summary: mortals who provide information or valuable items
